alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 4:47PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern West Feliciana, West Baton Rouge, southeastern Pointe Coupee, southern East Feliciana, northwestern Iberville and western East Baton Rouge Parishes through 515 PM CDT... At 447 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Zachary, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Zachary, Baker, Port Allen, New Roads, St. Francisville, Brusly, Maringouin, Slaughter, Rosedale, Grosse Tete, Erwinville, Ramah, Brownfields, Merrydale and Baton Rouge Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 133 and 156. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; West Feliciana
